column5: This amazing Boho-chic space (once a Furniture/Clothing Boutique) was recently renovated; it is the space for your next adventure! Interior includes: Tall ceilings, hardwood floors, very large open kitchen and living space, 2 bedrooms, and a small vanity area. Duplex with a separate Guest Suite next door. Breakfast cafe across the street; other cafes and shops nearby. Gypsy-Nomad-Bohemian decor will inspire you to find your tribe and travel the world with them. Yoga mats available.
